TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InvocationExpressionSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.ExpressionSyntax
Public NotInheritable Class InvocationExpressionSyntax Inherits ExpressionSyntax

Docs.summary: Represents an invocation expression consisting of an invocation target and an optional argument list or an array, parameterized property or object default property index.
